/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc   -gencode=arch=compute_60,code=\"sm_60,compute_60\" -rdc=true --expt-extended-lambda --expt-relaxed-constexpr --std=c++11 -Xcompiler -O3 -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/fastertransformer.dir/cuda_kernels.cu.o CMakeFiles/fastertransformer.dir/open_attention.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/fastertransformer.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcublas -lcudart -lpthread
